events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but it still hasn't arrived, and the tracking hasn't been updated for several days.
The issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's description of late arrival and lack of tracking updates.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the delivery delay inquiry to assist the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I’m here to help with your order status and figure out why your package is delayed.
Could you please provide your order number and the name used for the purchase so I can check the shipping information?
Here is my order number ABC123456, and the name on the order is John Smith. Please let me know what you find.
Thanks for the info. I’ve contacted the courier service and it appears there was a delay in transit. Your package should arrive within the next three business days.
Okay, I appreciate the update and the estimate. I’ll wait for the next few days and check again if needed.
Glad I could help clarify the situation. Your case is now resolved, but don’t hesitate to reach out if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to see if your package has arrived and if everything is okay with your order now.
Yes, the package was delivered yesterday. Everything is perfect, thank you for your help!
We’re happy to hear that your package arrived and that you’re satisfied. Closing this case now. Have a great day!
We’ve sent you a short survey to rate your customer support experience. Your feedback is very important to us.
